entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You found out the scientists made these creatures. They were being stored as cargo on the crashed ship. It seems the scientists are now fleeing from their own terrors. You must find the survivors soon, or there will be none left.
entries.journal_entry_description: So far the crash survivors have not been found. Apparently, the passengers of the crashed ship know a lot about the creatures found near the crash and the abandoned camp. You're not only going to need to find the crash victims now, but also find out how they are connected to the creatures.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: CV-4T gave you information leading to the next site the survivors planned to use as a camp. Head there and see if you can find any of them.
entries.task00_waypoint_name: Coordinates Given by CV-4T Droid Head
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Clear the camp of the new creatures and search for clues about the crash victims.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Clear the camp of the new creatures and search for clues about the crash victims.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: It appears this camp has been overrun as well. Kill these new creatures and search the camp for information about the crew.
entries.task03_waypoint_name: Coordinates Given by CV-4T Droid Head
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: You've cleared away enough of the creatures to give you time to investigate the camp. Look for any information to help you follow the survivors.
entries.task04_waypoint_name: Coordinates Given by CV-4T Droid Head
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: You find the lost journal of one of the crew. You take note of one of the entries; "We've managed to find a trail of blood leading away from the camp. Though the group is divided, the Captain has decided to take the fight to the creatures. We're setting off to follow the trail and see if we can beat the creatures at their source."
entries.task05_message_box_text: The datapad you just found has this as its final entry; "We've managed to find a trail of blood leading away from the camp. Though the group is divided, the Captain has decided to take the fight to the creatures. We're setting off to follow the trail and see if we can beat the creatures at their source." Perhaps if you followed the trail as well it would lead to the Captain and possibly some answers.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: You found the trail mentioned in the lost journal. Follow it and see if you can catch up to the others.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Kill the creatures trying to ambush you.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: The trail continues on from here. Follow it to it's destination.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: You must be nearing something important to the creatures. They have set up another ambush. Kill these creatures that are attempting to ambush you.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: The trail seems to be thinner from here on, you might be nearing the end.
entries.task11_comm_message_text: Good work. Head into the lair and see if there are any survivors. It's starting to look grim on any chance of finding anyone alive, but we must still try. Make sure you clear out any creatures you find inside.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: You decided to call in the location of the lair to agent Taarna.
entries.task11_journal_entry_title: Report Location of Lair to Taarna
entries.task12_journal_entry_description: Kill any of the creatures you may find in the lair.
entries.task13_journal_entry_description: Kill any of the creatures you may find in the lair.
entries.task14_journal_entry_description: Agent Taarna wants you to kill any of the creatures you find while looking for survivors.
entries.task14_journal_entry_title: Destroy the Creatures in the Lair
